ygData.subject: RE: another topic
ygData.msgSnippet: I m glad you liked it.  Personally, I lasted about 3 hours the first time and maybe another additional 4 hours total.  I made level 5 in no time flat and found
ygData.messageBody:
I'm glad you liked it. Personally, I lasted about 3 hours the first time
and maybe another additional 4 hours total. I made level 5 in no time flat
and found the game too easy and WAY too boring. The spell system, imho, is
HORRIBLE.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
Solusek Ro


> -----Original Message-----
> From: John Erik Maynus [mailto:jmaynus@...]
> Sent: Friday, September 10, 1999 3:33 PM
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] another topic
>
>
> From: "John Erik Maynus" <jmaynus@...>
>
> You hafta connect through Sonys Station for EQ, so either way you
> have to go
> through a gaming type zone. Maybe AC's is a lot different but by the time
> you get to the character select screen on EQ I could've been
> playing AC for
> 2-3 mins. Both are good games, everyone whined about how EQ's
> interface and
> all that, AC's seems to be better yet I've read in a few places ppl are
> saying it's worse. I don't find AC hard to play at all, it's
> easy to learn,
> have pretty good graphics, gameplay is easy and I think AC feels
> more like a
> real RPG then EQ does on how they handle skills and all that.
>
> **************************
> Azor
> Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
> **************************
>
>
